affx::md5sum

affx::md5sum Class Reference

an object oriented interface to generating MD5s. provides methods to do strings and files with one call. More...

#include <md5sum.h>

Public Attributes

MD5Context m_context
 The basic MD5 context as wrapped by md5sum.

Detailed Description

an object oriented interface to generating MD5s. provides methods to do strings and files with one call.
